plot: Bob North spends his last cent to reach the Bar X ranch, where he expects to find work and when he learns it is impossible to secure employment he becomes desperate. One misfortune follows ...
title: The Bandit's Child
plot_es: Bob North spends his last cent to reach the Bar X ranch, where he expects to find work and when he learns it is impossible to secure employment he becomes desperate. One misfortune follows ...
